message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in your product! I'd like to propose a price of $130.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand Alice, but I would like to stick to my previous offer of $130. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, Bob. I'm thinking more like $142.50. It's a fair price considering the value the product will bring you.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I am still hoping to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $135.
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob, but I think I can do better than $135. How about $140? It's a compromise, but I think it's a fair price for the value the product brings.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I would like to propose a final offer of $137.5.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $142. I think that's the minimum I can accept to make this deal worthwhile. Let me know if you're willing to meet me there.
I see, Alice. Thank you for your time and effort. I would like to make one last attempt at a price of $140.
